00015 ArmControl::ArmControl()
00016 {
00017         init();
00018         run();

00020 
00028 void ArmControl::init()
00029 {
00030         shutdown_ = false;
00031 
00032         // Initialize subscribers and clients
00033     cartesian_sub_ = n_.subscribe("cartesian_moves", 1000,
00034                                   &ArmControl::cartesianMovesCallback, this);
00035     constant_sub_ = n_.subscribe("constant_moves", 1,
00036                                  &ArmControl::constantMoveCallback, this);
00037     constant_time_sub_ = n_.subscribe("constant_move_times", 1,
00038                                       &ArmControl::constantMoveTimeCallback,
00039                                       this);
00040     time_client_ = n_.serviceClient<time_server::time_srv>("time_service");
00041 
00042     // Initialize the ARM
00043     arm_ = ManusArm::instance();
00044     try
00045     {
00046         arm_->init("can0");
00047     }
00048     catch (ArmException& e)
00049     {
00050         printf("%s\n", e.what());
00051         ROS_FATAL("Arm initialization failed");
00052         return;
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00064 void ArmControl::run()
00065 {
00066         // Move arm into origin position
00067         for (int i = 0; i < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00068         {
00069                 cartesian_move_.positions[i] = ORIGIN_POSITION[i];
00070                 cartesian_move_.speeds[i] = 2;
00071         }
00072         arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00073         arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00074 
00075         // Main loop
00076         while (ros::ok() && !shutdown_)
00077         {
00078                 ros::spinOnce();
00079         }
00080 
00081         // Move arm into final position only if ROS is still ok
00082         if (ros::ok())
00083         {
00084                 for (int i = 0; i < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00085                 {
00086                         cartesian_move_.positions[i] = FINAL_POSITION[1][i];
00087                         cartesian_move_.speeds[i] = 2;
00088                 }
00089                 arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00090                 arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00091 
00092                 while (!arm_->isMoveComplete())
00093                 {
00094                         //printf("Not Complete\n");
00095                         ros::Duration(0.06).sleep();
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099         printf("Arm control shutdown\n");
00100 }
00101 
00114 void ArmControl::cartesianMovesCallback(const arm::cartesian_moves::ConstPtr&
00115                                         cmd)
00116 {
00117         time_server::time_srv end_check;
00118     end_check.request.target = cmd->end;
00119 
00120     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cmd->moves.size(); i++)
00121     {
00122         if (time_client_.call(end_check))
00123         {
00124             printf("CAT end time : %f\n", end_check.request.target.toSec());
00125             printf("CA run time  : %f\n", cmd->moves[i].header.stamp.toSec());
00126             printf("Server time  : %f\n", end_check.response.actual.toSec());
00127             printf("Delta        : %f\n", end_check.response.delta.toSec());
00128 
00129             // Check for a current move and stop if necessary
00130             if (!arm_->isMoveComplete()) arm_->setMoveComplete(true);
00131 
00132             if (end_check.response.delta > ros::Duration(-0.2))
00133             {
00134                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < CART_MV_ARR_SZ; j++)
00135                 {
00136                     cartesian_move_.positions[j] = cmd->moves[i].positions[j];
00137                     cartesian_move_.speeds[j] = cmd->moves[i].speeds[j];
00138                 }
00139                 arm_->setMoveComplete(false);
00140                 arm_->moveCartesian(cartesian_move_);
00141             }
00142             else
00143             {
00144                 ROS_INFO("Out of time, movement sequence over!");
00145                 return;
00146             }
00147         }
00148         else
00149         {
00150             ROS_ERROR("Time server is not responding");
00151             return;
00152         }
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00169 void ArmControl::constantMoveCallback(const arm::constant_move::ConstPtr& cmd)
00170 {
00171         if (cmd->quit)
00172         {
00173                 shutdown_ = true;
00174         }
00175         else if (cmd->query)
00176     {
00177                 printf("\n%s", arm_->getPrintState().c_str());
00178     }
00179     else
00180     {
00181         for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00182                 constant_move_.states[i] = static_cast<int>(cmd->states[i]);
00183         for (int i = 0; i < SPD_ARR_SZ; i++)
00184                 constant_move_.speeds[i] = static_cast<int>(cmd->speeds[i]);
00185         arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00198 void ArmControl::constantMoveTimeCallback(const arm::constant_move_time::ConstPtr &cmd)
00199 {
00200     time_server::time_srv end_check;
00201     end_check.request.target = cmd->end;
00202 
00203     if (time_client_.call(end_check))
00204     {
00205         if (end_check.response.delta > ros::Duration(0))
00206         {
00207             ROS_INFO("Moving...");
00208 
00209             printf("Move start time  : %f\n", cmd->header.stamp.toSec());
00210             printf("Server time      : %f\n", end_check.response.actual.toSec());
00211             printf("Delta            : %f\n", (cmd->header.stamp -
00212                     end_check.response.actual).toSec());
00213             printf("Duration of move : %f\n", end_check.response.delta.toSec());
00214 
00215             for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00216             {
00217                 constant_move_.states[i] = cmd->move.states[i];
00218                 if (i < SPD_ARR_SZ)
00219                         constant_move_.speeds[i] = cmd->move.speeds[i];
00220             }
00221             arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00222 
00223             end_check.response.delta.sleep();
00224 
00225             // Stop
00226             for (int i = 0; i < CONST_MV_ARR_SZ; i++)
00227                                 constant_move_.states[i] = 0;
00228             arm_->moveConstant(constant_move_);
00229         }
00230         else
00231             ROS_ERROR("This movement would have started after its ending time");
00232     }
00233     else
00234         ROS_ERROR("Time server is not responding, movement command skipped");
00235 }
